attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The council tax is very unfair as in a lot of households only one person pays which is unfair, i believe a much fairer system would be a local sales tax,rich people spend more than people who are less well off, everyone would pay, and it would cost less to run than the council tax, all tills could be linked to the system and it could almost run its self
